job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Evolytics is evolving analytics by inspiring people to use data in ways that make a difference in the world. With a focus on optimizing consumer experiences and strengthening business growth, Evolytics works with world-class brands to support data initiatives that span the data lifecycle. Capabilities include: Measurement Strategy &amp; Planning, Data Audits, Analytics Implementation Services, Data Engineering, Reporting &amp; Analysis, Data Visualization, Testing &amp; Optimization, Data Science, and Customized Training.<br><br>As a Data Scientist at Evolytics, you will collaborate with client teams to help enterprise organizations improve their marketing, products, and processes. You’ll have the opportunity to be a thought leader in the analytics industry and to work on cutting edge projects where you’re building innovative, end-to-end solutions alongside a team.<br><br><strong><u>What You'll Be Doing<br></u></strong><ul><li>Listening to client business problems and recommending an analysis method</li><li>Cleanse and prepare large datasets for analysis</li><li>Conduct statistical analysis, including regression, decision tree, cluster analysis, t-test, correlation, etc.</li><li>Develop and refine machine learning models</li><li>Interpret analysis findings, focusing on business implications and recommended optimizations and next steps</li><li>Organize and present analysis approach and findings to clients, including both statistically minded analytics audiences as well as non-statistical audiences</li><li>Collaborate with data engineers to automate data pipelines</li><li>Document results and process for internal and client knowledgebases<br></li></ul><strong>WHAT EXPERIENCE WOULD WE LIKE TO SEE?<br></strong><ul><li>BS/MS degree in marketing, statistics, computer science, behavioral science or a related field</li><li>2+ years' experience with conducting data analysis on large data sets, via Python, R, SQL, SAS, Alteryx, or other statistical analysis tools</li><li>2+ years' experience communicating statistical results in a business setting</li><li>Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking</li><li>Legally authorized to work in the United States without company sponsorship now or in the future<br></li></ul><strong><u>Other Experience That Is Helpful, But Not Required<br></u></strong><ul><li>Creating and preparing databases and tables for predictive modeling and data science applications</li><li>Experience in big data environments such as AWS and Hive<br></li></ul><strong>CULTURE<br><br></strong>What’s it like to work at Evolytics? It’s being challenged by your analytics-passionate co-workers to push the envelope. It’s constantly learning and sharpening your skill set. It’s working toward that next “aha” moment with a client when you deliver a fantastic data-derived golden nugget. It’s having a blast with the team while you perfect your craft and get to do work you love.<br><br><strong><u>Perks<br></u></strong><ul><li>Relaxed work environment: casual dress code, pool/ping pong table, treadmill desks</li><li>Collaboration-oriented office space with plenty of room for working sessions or potlucks</li><li>Awesome team building events like a day at the Royals game or mini-golf with margaritas</li><li>Food…weekly lunches, daily snacks, fruits, beverages, unlimited coffee</li><li>Learning opportunities: company-provided training, conferences and super-smart co-workers<br></li></ul><strong><u>Benefits<br></u></strong><ul><li>Competitive Benefits Package including Health, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance</li><li>Great Compensation Package with Paid Time Off, Performance Bonuses and IRA Matching Contributions</li><li>Opportunity to work alongside amazingly fun people who are passionate about delivering awesome in everything they do.<br></li></ul>Consideration will be given to qualified candidates with varying levels of experience, with compensation commensurate with experience.<br><br><strong>AWARDS<br></strong><ul><li>Fortune’s Best Small and Medium Workplaces in 2020: #25 in US</li><li>Honored for Best Places to Work in 2020 by the Kansas City Business Journal</li><li>Recognized as a Great Place to Work in 2020</li><li>Voted Coolest Office Space (Small Business) by the Kansas City Business Journal</li><li>Named Top Analytics Agency by the Digital Analytics Association in 2018 and again in 2020<br></li></ul>Awesome people make powerful teams. Let’s do great things together!
